definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: All the panes of glass in the world today cover about four billion square metres.
sentences.chinese: 如今全世界所有玻璃板总计约有四十亿平方米。

sentences.english: Located in Xuhui District Shanghai with total floor area of 9,200 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 位于上海市徐汇区，总建筑面积约9，200平方米。

sentences.english: The standard premise covers 4800 square meters in total.
sentences.chinese: 我公司拥有标准厂房4800平方米。

sentences.english: Cabins can be up to seven square metres - that is bigger than many hotel rooms.
sentences.chinese: 包厢面积超过7平方米，这可比许多旅馆房间都要大。

sentences.english: The living space is measured in square metres.
sentences.chinese: 居住面积用平方米计算。

sentences.english: The building area is 17000 square meters.
She is located in Haining city of Zhejiang province, covering an area of over 40,000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落于浙江省海宁市，占地面积4万多平方米。
夹板，模板，19毫米厚平方米。

sentences.english: Theoretically, 35 yuan per square metre is in the law of the market.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，每平方米35元是符合市场规律的。

sentences.english: The generally accepted standard is 1020 watts per square meter at sea level.
sentences.chinese: 普遍接受的标准1020在海平面每平方米瓦。

sentences.english: The Expo occupied 5 halls with a total area of around 15000 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 展览场地占5个大堂共有面积15000平方米。

sentences.english: Our monthly production capacity is 50000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 我们每月生产量为50000平方米。

sentences.english: Wong Shi Cheng all brick structures, an area of 2000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 皇史宬全为砖石结构，面积达2000余平方米。

sentences.english: The project has 145 square meters on two floors and a terrace.
sentences.chinese: 该项目有145平方米，有两层楼和一个露台。

sentences.english: The US goal for solar heating by 2020 is 200m square metres.
sentences.chinese: 美国太阳能加热阵列的2020年目标是两亿平方米。

definition: floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
